item.title: Daily Podcast 2026-03-01
item.description: Here's a deep-dive segment based on the provided information: | In a significant advance for crop engineering, researchers have used protein engineering to solve a fundamental trade-off that limits crop performance under cold stress. | The core innovation is that the team successfully modified this E3 ligase to break the link between cold tolerance and phosphate uptake.
item.itunes:author: Eva Dai
item.itunes:summary: Here's a deep-dive segment based on the provided information: | In a significant advance for crop engineering, researchers have used protein engineering to solve a fundamental trade-off that limits crop performance under cold stress. | The core innovation is that the team successfully modified this E3 ligase to break the link between cold tolerance and phosphate uptake.
